ComicInfo.Summary:
The Hong Kong finals conclude as Chun-Li takes on five deadly Shaolin fighters at once! Can even the strongest woman in the world prevail against the fighting styles of the Snake, Mantis, Crane, Monkey, and Tiger? Plus, a Street Fighter IV bonus story featuring the all-new character Rufus!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/street-fighter-ii-turbo-4/4000-153031/
